title: Gorsuch Voted in As Ninth Supreme Court Justice (Audio)
itunes:title: Gorsuch Voted in As Ninth Supreme Court Justice (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Laura Litvan, a congressional reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses the final Senate vote on Neil Gorsuch, after republicans voted to enact the nuclear option for court nominees. She speaks with Bloomberg's Michael Best and Greg Stohr.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
